title: nodeReference
description: A nodeReference is a pointer to another node - the parent, a child or a neighbor. A nodeReference contains a relative URL to the referenced NID, and a set of meta information which helps determines if a client loads the data and maintains store consistency.

id.description: Tree Key ID of the referenced node represented as string.

mbs.description: An array of four doubles, corresponding to x, y, z and radius of the [minimum bounding sphere](mbs.cmn.md) of a node.

version.description: Version (store update session ID) of the referenced node.

featureCount.description: Number of features in the referenced node and its descendants, down to the leaf nodes.

examples.title: Node reference for integrated mesh scene layer.
